      • valueSizeDelta

        public MetadataTransactionFactory<T> valueSizeDelta(int valueSizeDelta)
        Use this method when you want to update/modify a metadata. The value size delta needs to be provided in order to update the existing metadata correctly.
        Parameters:
        valueSizeDelta - the new value size delta
        Returns:
        this factory.
